item.title: Using C# 6 to make 'bad' SQL awesome
item.description: I'm busy going through Pluralsight watching Exploring C# 6 with Jon Skeet by Rob Conery. Jon Skeet goes ahead and makes this epic method that looks like it's so naughty but is pretty cool.
item.author: website@gordonbeeming.com (Gordon Beeming)
